TextView.android:text: Registration of certificate of marriage, on time registration (0-30 days from date of Marriage) & delayed registration 31 days & above from date of marriage.
3. Affidavit of request to be Married at (Garden Wedding) (4 original copy)
4. Affidavit of Delayed Registration of COM
1.1. Receive\n\n1.2. Process, type the Marriage certificate
2. Pay to the Municipal Treasurer’s Office

₱100.00
(1 year from the date of marriage)

₱150.00
(1 year and above)
3. Review the accomplished form and the supporting documents
3.1. Instruct customer to review the documents.
4. Get the Control, Book and Page number.
4.1. Assignment of Registry No. and type the name of Receiving Officer
5. Present the OR to the Receiving Clerk

5.1. Accept OR

5.2. Advice the customer to come back after 10 days posting, & post “Notice”

5.3. After 10 days, receiving clerk, affix registry number

5.4. Seal

5.5. present accomplished COD to the MCR/Assistant for review and signature segregate and file
6. Submit the accomplished Certificate of Marriage
7.1. Segregate\n\n7.2. Give owner’s and solemnizing officer copy
8. After 10 days, customer get the Accomplished COM (if delayed registration)
8.1. Verify & release owner’s copy and Solemnizing Officer Copy
9. Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) and drop it in the feedback box
9.1. Request Client to Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) form in the feedback box
